name: Basilisk Hide Vest
description: Stone-Still: You have advantage on saving throws against effects that would prone you or reduce your speed.

name: Yeti Hide Vest (Leather)
description: Aura of Cold: As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can emanate a chilling aura. The attacking creature takes 1d4 cold damage. This reaction can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest. Winter's Blessing: You can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. Additionally, the first time you take cold damage on your turn, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Carrion Stalker Hide
description: Specific Resistances: Necrotic

name: Gnoll Bone-Bound Hide
description: Savage Inspiration: When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points with a melee weapon attack while wearing this armor, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Antlion Chitin Scale Mail
description: Vibration Sense: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or vibrations while on solid ground.

name: Scorpion Carapace Breastplate
description: Unyielding Shell: You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and resistance to poison damage.

name: Scorpion Carapace Halfplate
description: Unyielding Shell: You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and resistance to poison damage.

name: Yeti Hide Breastplate
description: Aura of Cold: As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can emanate a chilling aura. The attacking creature takes 1d4 cold damage. This reaction can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest. Winter's Blessing: You can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. Additionally, the first time you take cold damage on your turn, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Yeti Hide Armor
description: Aura of Cold: As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can emanate a chilling aura. The attacking creature takes 1d4 cold damage. This reaction can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest. Winter's Blessing: You can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. Additionally, the first time you take cold damage on your turn, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Yeti Hide Half Plate
description: Aura of Cold: As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can emanate a chilling aura. The attacking creature takes 1d4 cold damage. This reaction can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest. Winter's Blessing: You can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. Additionally, the first time you take cold damage on your turn, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: Stone Endurance: When you take damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage you take by 1d6. You can use this a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

name: Dune Blight Carapace
description: Shifting Plates: When you are subjected to an effect that would move you, you can use your reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 feet.

name: Carrion Stalker Cloak
description: Specific Resistances: Necrotic

name: Yeti Hide Cloak/Mantle
description: Winter's Blessing: You can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. Additionally, the first time you take cold damage on your turn, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Basilisk Hide Cloak
description: Medusa's Patience: When you use the Hide action while wearing this cloak, you can remain hidden even if you move up to half your speed during the same turn.

name: Gnoll War Shroud
description: Fearless Cackle: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

name: Remorhaz Molt Cloak
description: Heated Carapace: Any creature that grapples you takes 1d4 fire damage.

name: Shield
description: No specific special properties mentioned for the base Shield.

name: Gargoyle Hide Shield
description: Specific Resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, Slashing

name: Dune Blight Shield
description: Shifting Plates: When you are subjected to an effect that would move you, you can use your reaction to reduce the distance you are moved by up to 10 feet.

name: Scorpion Carapace Shield
description: Barbed Defense: As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can deal 1d4 piercing damage to the attacker. This can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

name: Yeti Hide Shield
description: Aura of Cold: As a reaction when you are hit by a melee attack, you can emanate a chilling aura. The attacking creature takes 1d4 cold damage. This reaction can be used a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest. Winter's Blessing: You can tolerate temperatures as low as -100 degrees Fahrenheit without any additional protection. Additionally, the first time you take cold damage on your turn, you gain 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Wurmhide Grapplers
description: These thick, rough gloves are crafted from the durable hide of a Great Sand Wurm, offering a firm and unyielding grip. Grasping Jaws: You have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to grapple a creature.

name: Wind-Woven Gauntlets
description: Fashioned from the ephemeral essence of a Dust Devil Elemental and magically stabilized, these gloves feel surprisingly light and airy. Gusting Blow: Once per short or long rest, when you hit a creature with an unarmed strike, you can choose to push the target up to 10 feet away from you.

name: Scarab Shell Gauntlets
description: These rigid gauntlets are made from the polished carapace of a Grave Scarab, providing exceptional resistance to corrosive substances. Specific Resistances: Acid

name: Antlion Chitin Boots
description: Crafted from the durable, segmented chitin of an Antlion, these boots offer excellent traction and agility on loose ground. Sand-Hardened: You gain a +5 bonus to your speed when moving over sandy terrain.

name: Wurm-Strider Boots
description: Crafted from segmented Wurm hide, these boots help you navigate the shifting sands with surprising ease. Burrower's Gait: Moving through sandy or loose earth terrain costs you no extra movement.

name: Dust Skimmer Boots
description: Light and flexible, these boots are infused with the essence of a Dust Devil Elemental, making your steps unnaturally swift. Fleetfoot: Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

name: Grave Strider Boots
description: These heavy, solemn boots are reinforced with Grave Scarab chitin, granting a sense of stability against the corrupting influence of the desert's undead. Unhallowed Ground: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened by undead creatures.

name: Tremor Cord Belt
description: This rough, braided belt incorporates nerve fibers from a Great Sand Wurm, granting a primal sense of the ground's movements. Tremorsense (10 feet): You gain tremorsense out to a range of 10 feet.

name: Zephyr Weaver Belt
description: This belt, woven from threads infused with a Dust Devil Elemental's energy, helps you slip away from danger. Evasive Swirl: Once per short or long rest, when you are hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to reduce the attack's damage by 1d6.

name: Scarab Warden Belt
description: This belt features a prominent Grave Scarab chitin buckle, imbued with protective energy against the blighted energies of the Sands of Doom. Specific Resistances: Necrotic

name: Remorhaz Carapace Vest
special_properties: Heated Carapace, Inner Furnace, Indomitable Form
description: Heated Carapace: Any creature that grapples you or that you hit with a successful unarmed strike takes 1d4 fire damage. Inner Furnace: You have advantage on saving throws against cold damage. Indomitable Form: When you are subjected to an effect that would move you, knock you prone, or restrain you, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the saving throw against the effect.

name: Remorhaz Carapace Plate
special_properties: Heated Carapace, Inner Furnace, Indomitable Form
description: Heated Carapace: Any creature that grapples you or that you hit with a successful unarmed strike takes 1d4 fire damage. Inner Furnace: You have advantage on saving throws against cold damage. Indomitable Form: When you are subjected to an effect that would move you, knock you prone, or restrain you, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the saving throw against the effect.
